flawed_nl_solution:
First find Karen's net speed by subtracting the speed of the current: 10 mph - 4 mph = <<10-4=4>>4 mph
Then divide the length of the river by Karen's speed to find how long it takes her to paddle up it: 12 miles / 4 mph = <<12/4=3>>3 hours
